alert.note: Alert for Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:21AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Walker and southwestern Dade Counties through 545 AM EDT... At 521 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sulpher Springs, or 12 miles south of Trenton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, up to penny sized hail and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Chickamauga, Naomi, Center Post, Rising Fawn, Suttles Mill, Noble, Cloudland Canyon State Park, Cooper Heights and Rock Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency.
